LanguageData.SleepingMechanoids.label: sleeping mechanoids
LanguageData.SleepingMechanoids.arrivedLetter: There are a few sleeping hostile mechanoids in this area.\n\nThe mechanoids may or may not wake up when you approach them, so beware.
LanguageData.SleepingMechanoids.descriptionDialogue: there are {0} sleeping mechanoids in the area
